name: Vladyslav Fokin
summary: Full Stack developer with experience in JavaScript/TypeScript, React, Next.js, and SEO.
Started as an SEO specialist and later transitioned to full-cycle development.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.desc: Developed web applications using JS/TS, React, Next, Nest, Vite. Implemented frontend/backend functionality, API integration, payment and delivery systems (experience with Wayforpay, Ukrposhta, Nova Poshta), authentication through NextAuth, Firebase/OAuth, JWT.

experience.title: SEO specialist
experience.desc: Analyzed websites and online stores, optimized content for search engines, developed strategies to boost organic traffic, and monitored SEO metrics for improved visibility.

education.university: European University, Private Higher Educational Institution
